E-Office学园 &bull;... ... 3. 4. 8. CompBook 资讯人的书香世界 3. 4. 9. highhand 高手过招 3. 4. 10. salecomp 电脑二手市场.
disorderly conduct 暴乱的行为highhanded conduct 高压的行为impertinent conduct 无礼的行为

entry.def: If you say that someone is high-handed, you disapprove of them because they use their authority in an unnecessarily forceful way without considering other people's feelings.

example.ex: He wants to be seen as less bossy and high-handed.
example.tran: 他不想让自己显得太专横霸道。

example.ex: ...his allegedly high-handed organisation of government business in parliament.
example.tran: 据传他在议会中处理政府事务时专横跋扈的作风
